name: wpapps Press
author: alexrollin, ismiaini

sections.description:
wpapps.press is Special Sauce for GeoDirectory

This plugin works with GeoDirectory V2+ to add special features not included with GeoDirectory.

wpapps Featured First for “Search For” results – enable this press to make featured listings returned in search results ‘rise to the top’ automatically.

wpapps.press GD Shortcode button for Gutenberg Classic Editor block – sometimes you just want to use a shortcode in a block. Turn on this press to add a GDV2 shortcode builder button to the Gutenberg Classic editor block. You shouldn’t save shortcodes in classic blocks, but it is the best place to add a button. Instead, copy out the shortcode and add it to a Shortcode or HTML block.

Essential features for your favorite plugins

  • More feature for your directory with wpapps GeoDirectory Option. – Add more features to your directory such as show profile tabs by listing owner or non-listing owner, users can choose any category they want to display, force users to select parent categories, and many more.

  • New shortcodes and widgets with wpapps UsersWP Options. – Add a new shortcode or widgets that is perfect for the GD Details template and UserWP Profile Page.

  • Integrate GetPaid with marketing automation, CRM, and more with wpapps GetPaid Options – Add trigger GetPaid in automation FluenCRM and actions Publisher in Uncanny Automator to make assign user to list easier.

  • New and interesting features for BuddyPress and GeoDirectory integration with wpapps BuddyPress Options – Add a new shortcode or widgets that is perfect for the GD Details template and BuddyPress Profile Page.

  • Easy create new archive item (card) templates with wpapps Card Templates – Easy card templates for use in lists on pages and archives. This allows you to design your own template.

  • Improve your search with wpapps Location Search – Use search more effectively by making sure your users find listings. Provide a curated single or double (dependant) dropdown to make sure your visitors find listings on your site.

  • Advanced media library with wpapps Media Library For GeoDirectory – Allow your admins or listing owners to access the media library to manage images on the Add and Edit Listing pages.

  • Turning LIsting Owners into “Publisher” with wpapps Publisher for GeoDirectory – Giving your site members the ability to publish more than one listing without having to pay again.

  • Power your listing based enquiry forms with wpapps Gravity Forms for Geodirectory – You can use all the Gravity Forms addons you know and love to do more with your form based workflows.

short_description: Effortlessly install and manage enhancements (aka “Press”) for your favorite WordPress plugins.
